org.apache.jmeter.protocol.http.parser
Class URLCollection

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.jmeter.protocol.http.parser.URLCollection
public class URLCollection
extends Object

Collection class designed for handling URLs Before a URL is added to the collection, it is wrapped in a URLString class. The iterator unwraps the URL before return. N.B. Designed for use by HTMLParser, so is not a full implementation - e.g. does not support remove()

Version:
$Revision: 519689 $ $Date: 2007-03-18 20:47:27 +0000 (Sun, 18 Mar 2007) $
